metadata.title: CVE-2017-9268 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In the open build service before 201707022 the wipetrigger and rebuild actions checked the wrong project for permissions, allowing authenticated users to cause operations on projects where they did not have permissions leading to denial of service (resource consumption).

criterions.comment: open-build-service package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
